org.apache.mina.examples.httpserver

Class HttpProtocolHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mina.common.IoHandlerAdapter
      • org.apache.mina.handler.StreamIoHandler
        • org.apache.mina.examples.httpserver.HttpProtocolHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IoHandler

    public class HttpProtocolHandler
extends StreamIoHandler
    A simplistic HTTP protocol handler that replies back the URL and headers which a client requested.
    Version:
    $Rev: 350169 $, $Date: 2005-12-01 06:17:41 +0100 (Thu, 01 Dec 2005) $
    Author:
    The Apache Directory Project (dev@directory.apache.org)
